content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Jun 2018Hi all, any idea when the Astrea IV PE Bonds will be allocated (seeing that application has closed)?1 answerAnswerBump0

Goh Kah KiatLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 12 Jun 2018Based on page 53 of the prospectus, balloting would commence on 13 June and issuance of bonds would occur on 14 June, with 18 June being the date of commencement of trading. So you should know by 14 June I guess?0 comments1
